job.command:
setenv EMLOGS /star/u/zamiller/PWGSpace/run15ppAnaTree/prod/anaTreeMaker_v3_100516/readTreeOut/log/readAnaTree_HT1 setenv EMOUTPUT /star/u/zamiller/PWGSpace/run15ppAnaTree/prod/anaTreeMaker_v3_100516/readTreeOut/out/readAnaTree_HT1
echo EMLOGS : $EMLOGS echo EMOUTPUT : $EMOUTPUT cp ${INPUTFILE0} . ls *.anaTree.root > processedRuns.list
root4star -l -b -q 'StRoot/macros/readAnaTree.C(20000000,"processedRuns.list","${FILEBASENAME}.hists.root",2,false)' ls -la .
mv -v $SCRATCH/${FILEBASENAME}_${JOBID}.log $EMLOGS/${FILEBASENAME}.log
